metadata.synopsis: Introductory cinematic in TUT for any avatar that's not Laezel, Wyll, Karlach or Shadowheart. Pod opens, players falls on the ground and gets up.This dialog play on the third player occupying a default player pod.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start TUT_Avernus_C with any avatar that's not Laezel, Wyll, Karlach or Shadowheart. You'll need three curstom players to have this play on the third.

0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player can be seen in the pod, then it opens and they fall on the ground.

1.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Player gets up ready to find a way out of the hells.|
